title: i_am_viral
author: i_am_viral
created_time: May 18, 2022, 06:44:37 PMLast edit: June 21, 2022, 03:07:10 PM by i_am_viral
content: endfb.com back up and paid 210€ for a year a head, saving from 34€ /month(408€/year)But now my phone no charge and phone repair man say he suspect the charging port, so me now need money to pay phone repair man.Will pay back within 7 days +10%My BTC address : 50$+bc1qv6ue0c68vjp8uge5lk4crrcqfgnclv3dtweezsMe CEO worlds most valuable business model endfb.com

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: What hosting specs do you use? And why is your website a priority if the rest of your life is as messed up as you say?

comments.author: i_am_viral
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on May 18, 2022, 06:56:57 PMWhat hosting specs do you use? And why is your website a priority if the rest of your life is as messed up as you say?Hosting specs ? E-commerce platform My website endfb.com carries the worlds most valuable business model.I was just reading up on google if I can host a Wordpress website somewhere else because the bill is 32€, I mean if I can outsource it that would mean that all my bills get very close to 0€ I am definitely over paying, they even selling that plan right now for half the price , 16€ somewhat okey, may have to pay a head for a year thought.

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: Quote from: i_am_viral on May 18, 2022, 07:05:40 PMWordpress website somewhere else because the bill is 32€Per year or per month? For $14 per year you can get a VPS. More work to install Wordpress but cheap to use. I like RackNerd: not bad quality for a low price.

comments.author: i_am_viral
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on May 18, 2022, 07:28:47 PMQuote from: i_am_viral on May 18, 2022, 07:05:40 PMWordpress website somewhere else because the bill is 32€Per year or per month? For $14 per year you can get a VPS. More work to install Wordpress but cheap to use. I like RackNerd: not bad quality for a low price.Well it’s per month, the auction software is also actually 500€/year that I forgot about… but it’s paid until some winter time and may actually downgrade if it’s not the best on the market.If you say that Wordpress can be hosted on a vps than it would be definitely cool to have no bills to pay for a while.But Wordpress might intentionally block that somehow with their e-commerce/business plans.Right now it’s 32€ / month , 16€ if paid a head for a year if I can quit and export the website, plug-ins,all it’s content and start new website.

comments.author: i_am_viral
comments.body: Quote from: Maasdamer on May 19, 2022, 05:31:43 AMQuote from: i_am_viral on May 18, 2022, 06:44:37 PMI don’t really believe in coincidences, I’ve had plenty of money to pay but somehow got hit with a worse case scenario than what I though what a worst case scenario could be.I mean I sleep outside, for more than two years.I use my solar panel for electricity.I use an internet that costs 12€ a / month( it was free while I was in Germany) and that is the only bill I have to pay besides website hosting.My Mobile phone is the most expensive Item I possess , and it’s gone broke over 10 times ! That is maximum financial damage each time ! I don’t have a car, house, apartment, not even a tent.How about finally getting a job? You are begging here for over 1 year now, countless threads.Asked for one yesterday and many many many times before, I am more advanced and skilled than the worlds best ceo, also stronger and better fighter than an Olympic gold medalists.I don’t give a shit about job’s, it’s all free money.If I catch my own fish the entire economy is close to obsolete, it’s nothing ! I already deserve 100 million for what society has done to me

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on May 18, 2022, 06:56:57 PMAnd why is your website a priority if the rest of your life is as messed up as you say?Mental illness often causes people to get their priorities misaligned.  I'm no psychologist, nor do I play one on the internet, but giving this guy's fascination with ending facebook, and if his living situation is accurately described, it seems pretty obvious he's mentally ill.

comments.author: i_am_viral
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on May 19, 2022, 03:31:47 PMQuote from: LoyceMobile on May 18, 2022, 06:56:57 PMAnd why is your website a priority if the rest of your life is as messed up as you say?Mental illness often causes people to get their priorities misaligned.  I'm no psychologist, nor do I play one on the internet, but giving this guy's fascination with ending facebook, and if his living situation is accurately described, it seems pretty obvious he's mentally ill.Not mentally ill but a lunatic indeed, people think I'm joking when I say that I attacked america and they made the coronavirus in self defence.Go to the CIA and ask documents about me.You get hit with a permission not granted, classified information under national security

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: Quote from: i_am_viral on May 19, 2022, 04:29:07 PMpeople think I'm joking when I say that I attacked america and they made the coronavirus in self defence.That's certainly a whole new level. And there I thought I could give you serious advice on hosting.

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on May 18, 2022, 06:56:57 PMWhat hosting specs do you use? And why is your website a priority if the rest of your life is as messed up as you say?He's angry with the world and the website(s) are his vendetta/mouth piece.

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: Quote from: Timelord2067 on May 20, 2022, 02:07:54 PMHe's angry with the world and the website(s) are his vendetta/mouth piece.I often forget there are still people who care about opinions on the internet.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on May 20, 2022, 02:06:48 PMThat's certainly a whole new level. And there I thought I could give you serious advice on hosting.I appreciate your advice on hosting.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on May 19, 2022, 03:31:47 PMQuote from: LoyceMobile on May 18, 2022, 06:56:57 PMAnd why is your website a priority if the rest of your life is as messed up as you say?Mental illness often causes people to get their priorities misaligned.  I'm no psychologist, nor do I play one on the internet, but giving this guy's fascination with ending facebook, and if his living situation is accurately described, it seems pretty obvious he's mentally ill.I have said this similarly before and after that, I didn't want to complicate things much for him and eventually deepen the problem. he should be given the maximum dose of tolerance, as much as possible.Quote from: i_am_viral on May 18, 2022, 07:55:35 PMRight now it’s 32€ / month , 16€ if paid a head for a year if I can quit and export the website, plug-ins,all it’s content and start new website.If your website can't earn to cover hosting costs, probably is best you can do is turn off your website and wait for a better time for it or look for another idea. You promoted your site here, launched a signature campaign, and did everything you could. it is obvious that it is not going well.if you dig yourself a hole, and you actually want to get out of it, the first thing to do is stop digging.

comments.author: i_am_viral
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on May 20, 2022, 11:27:15 PMQuote from: DireWolfM14 on May 19, 2022, 03:31:47 PMQuote from: LoyceMobile on May 18, 2022, 06:56:57 PMAnd why is your website a priority if the rest of your life is as messed up as you say?Mental illness often causes people to get their priorities misaligned.  I'm no psychologist, nor do I play one on the internet, but giving this guy's fascination with ending facebook, and if his living situation is accurately described, it seems pretty obvious he's mentally ill.I have said this similarly before and after that, I didn't want to complicate things much for him and eventually deepen the problem. he should be given the maximum dose of tolerance, as much as possible.Quote from: i_am_viral on May 18, 2022, 07:55:35 PMRight now it’s 32€ / month , 16€ if paid a head for a year if I can quit and export the website, plug-ins,all it’s content and start new website.If your website can't earn to cover hosting costs, probably is best you can do is turn off your website and wait for a better time for it or look for another idea. You promoted your site here, launched a signature campaign, and did everything you could. it is obvious that it is not going well.if you dig yourself a hole, and you actually want to get out of it, the first thing to do is stop digging.This forum is not my only place, I can go on Facebook, choose a country and use it as my own personal timeline, and so can you. I am visiting relevant expos with 10.000 + visitors and want to setup my OWN stands.I am after the highest quality and providing value, it should only be a matter of time before I start earning money.Shit i can blow up and become very famous at any time.What is that endfb.com is doing ?IT can overthrow countries with co-ordinated work. People can reach hundreds of thousands of real people.IT aims to make cinematic, movie like advertisements AS a bonus, ive completed 2 and ready for number 3 ( Watch out Hollywood )IT is possible to sell many thing and services through endfb.com
